name: Fvese-mvfun2
milkdrop_raw:
[preset00]
fRating=5.000000
fGammaAdj=1.980000
fDecay=0.980000
fVideoEchoZoom=1.000157
fVideoEchoAlpha=0.500000
nVideoEchoOrientation=1
nWaveMode=5
bAdditiveWaves=1
bWaveDots=0
bWaveThick=0
bModWaveAlphaByVolume=0
bMaximizeWaveColor=0
bTexWrap=0
bDarkenCenter=0
bRedBlueStereo=0
bBrighten=0
bDarken=0
bSolarize=0
bInvert=0
fWaveAlpha=1.007743
fWaveScale=1.032186
fWaveSmoothing=0.900000
fWaveParam=0.000000
fModWaveAlphaStart=1.000000
fModWaveAlphaEnd=1.000000
fWarpAnimSpeed=1.388600
fWarpScale=0.013297
fZoomExponent=0.951372
fShader=0.970000
zoom=0.932700
rot=0.000000
cx=0.500000
cy=0.500001
dx=0.000000
dy=0.000000
warp=0.535000
sx=0.803396
sy=1.000000
wave_r=0.149800
wave_g=0.150000
wave_b=0.150001
wave_x=0.500000
wave_y=0.500000
ob_size=0.000000
ob_r=0.199900
ob_g=0.200000
ob_b=0.200000
ob_a=1.000000
ib_size=0.000000
ib_r=0.200000
ib_g=0.200000
ib_b=0.200000
ib_a=1.000000
nMotionVectorsX=64.000000
nMotionVectorsY=1.000000
mv_dx=0.000000
mv_dy=0.000000
mv_l=0.700000
mv_r=1.000000
mv_g=1.000000
mv_b=1.000000
mv_a=1.000000
per_frame_1=wave_r = wave_r + 0.100*( 0.60*sin(0.933*time) + 0.40*sin(1.045*time) );
per_frame_2=wave_g = wave_g + 0.050*( 0.60*sin(0.900*time) + 0.40*sin(0.956*time) );
per_frame_3=wave_b = wave_b + 0.500*( 0.60*sin(0.700*time) + 0.40*sin(0.300*time) );
per_frame_4=mv_r = mv_r + bass*2;
per_frame_5=mv_g = mv_g + treb*2;
per_frame_6=mv_b = mv_b + mid*2;
per_frame_7=mv_y = 1.25;
per_frame_8=zoom = zoom+(bass_att-0.8)*0.2;
per_pixel_1=rot =(0.1*bass)-rad * 3-2+(0.5*rad-10-(0.5*rad-3*time)- 0.2*bass_att);
